gov.nasa.arc.mct.gui
Interface FeedView.SynchronizationControl

Enclosing class:
FeedView
public static interface FeedView.SynchronizationControl

Provide interaction with the synchronization time state.

Method Summary
 void synchronizationDone()
          Complete the time synchronization across views.
 void update(long time)
          Updates the synchronization time.
 

Method Detail

update

void update(long time)
Updates the synchronization time. Using this method is preferable to calling synchronizationDone() followed by FeedView.synchronizeTime(long) because it is atomic.

Parameters:
time - new time to synchronize on

synchronizationDone

void synchronizationDone()
Complete the time synchronization across views. This must be called in order to restart normal feed activity.
